summary: U.S. nuclear tests in space, and the development of the military intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM).
cast: Raymond Garthoff|Bernard Lovell|Bernard Schriever|William Shatner|Fidel Castro|Dwight D. Eisenhower|Adolf Hitler|John F. Kennedy|Nikita Khrushchev|Joseph Stalin
title: Nukes in Space
